# If you are an official mirror you know what the user agent field should be!
# If you want to be an ioccc mirror contact <mirror-request@ioccc.org>.  You
# must include IOCCC 2013 in the subject line or your email will bounce.

# Added due to slurping up everthing as fast as it could
User-agent: sistrix
Disallow: /

# I watched this bot for 4 consecutive days, it indexed the whole site 4 times
# each day (using GETs)
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

# Repeated indexing
User-agent: Ezooms
Disallow: /

User-Agent: *
